# sectionInsetReference

**Instance Property**

The boundary that section insets are defined in relation to.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var sectionInsetReference: UICollectionViewFlowLayout.SectionInsetReference { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewFlowLayout/SectionInsetReference-swift.enum/fromContentInset].

The minimum value of this property is always the collection view’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScrollView/contentInset]. For example, if the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewFlowLayout/SectionInsetReference-swift.enum/fromSafeArea], but the adjusted content inset is greater than the combination of the safe area and section insets, then the section’s content is aligned with the content inset instead.

## Configuring item spacing

- **minimumLineSpacing**: The minimum spacing to use between lines of items in the grid.
- **minimumInteritemSpacing**: The minimum spacing to use between items in the same row.
- **itemSize**: The default size to use for cells.
- **estimatedItemSize**: The estimated size of cells in the collection view.
- **automaticSize**: A placeholder size for self-sizing cells.
- **sectionInset**: The margins used to lay out content in a section.
- **UICollectionViewFlowLayout.SectionInsetReference**: Constants that describe the reference point of the section insets.
